import React, { useState } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; const AddOwner = () => { const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(e.target); try { const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/add_owner", { method: "POST", body: formData, }); const data = await response.json(); console.log("Server Response:", data); // Show success/error as alert alert(data.success ? `✅ ${data.message}` : `❌ ${data.message}`); if (data.success) e.target.reset(); // reset form on success } catch (error) { console.error("Full Fetch Error:", error); alert("❌ Error submitting form! Check console for details."); } }; return (
{/* --- All your existing form fields --- */}

); }; export default AddOwner;
